name: Lana Health
description: Lana Health is a one-of-a-kind modern patient experience platform, designed to simplify patient journeys while creating healthier and frictionless experiences for patients seeking care, whether in the hospital or at home.
one_liner: Lana Health is a one-of-a-kind modern patient experience platform, designed to simplify patient journeys while creating healthier and frictionless experiences for patients seeking care, whether in the hospital or at home.
